abstract: Researchers are working to incorporate communications devices such as cellphones into clothing.
snippet: Researchers are working to incorporate communications devices into the clothes we wear.
lead_paragraph: Researchers are working to incorporate communications devices into the clothes we wear.

headline.main: Wired Textiles for a Phone as Useful as the Shirt on Your Back
headline.print_headline: Wired Textiles for a Phone as Useful as the Shirt on Your Back
headline.seo: ‘Smart Textiles’ for a Phone as Useful as the Shirt on Your Back
